original: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: āsavam dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo
analyzed: na no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsavam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca na no āsavaḥ

original: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā noāsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca
analyzed: paṭicca no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no āsavam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca
na no āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavañca
analyzed: āsavañca noāsavañca dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsavañca

original: noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavañca noāsavañca
analyzed: noāsavañca dhammam paṭicca na noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā āsavañca noāsavañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ ca na noāsavaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā
